post.body: Interviewing Tamas today for STEAL THIS SHOW! http://stealthisshow.com <--- do we need a 0Net site?!
@nofish yeah just throw up your flac on <somefilehost>. Great interview, will try to get this up after the weekend!

comment.body: @Nofish: It'll be no problem, we got a lot of good stuff. It was cool to run through some of the 0net apps, and also the TF comments :p
